snippet: TEICHER--Laurence. On May 24, 2016. Beloved partner of almost 40 years to Peggy Palmer. Loving, devoted father of Tracy and Michael Nathanson, Daryl and Alan Eisenberg and Allison and Lou Wallach. Adoring grandfather of Jillian and Amanda Eisenberg, Jake and Nicky Nathanson and Charlie and Annie Wallach. Loving brother to Jeffrey and Joyce Teicher and the late Ronny Teicher and adored uncle to his nieces and nephews. A true bon vivant and friend to all, he will be dearly missed. In lieu of flowers, please consider a donation to New York Presbyterian Hospital or to a charity of your choice. Service will be Thursday, May 26 9:30am at The Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave. at 91st St. 1/3
